main event: A UFO sighting was reported involving a bright flash seen across the horizon, followed by the sighting of a possible submerged surface vessel.
interesting points: The sighting involved a bright flash that was visible over a large distance,The report mentions a possible connection to a surface vessel,The sighting was documented in a historical US Air Force program (Project Blue Book),The report indicates a negative evaluation by the Air Force headquarters,The document includes detailed communication to various military facilities.
sighted object: a bright flash and possibly a submerged surface vessel
